thread.title: April Xbox Games With Gold includes Ryse, Assassin's Creed Revelations
thread.title_full: April Xbox Games With Gold includes Ryse, Assassin's Creed Revelations

title: April Xbox Games With Gold includes Ryse, Assassin's Creed Revelations
text:
April Xbox Games With Gold includes Ryse, Assassin's Creed Revelations The Walking Dead and Darksiders, too. By Wesley Yin-Poole   
Microsoft's announced the April lineup of Xbox Games With Gold and it's a tidy list. 
Xbox One users get Crytek's Xbox One launch title Ryse: Son of Rome and Telltale's The Walking Dead: Season 2. 
Xbox 360 users, and Xbox One users through Backward Compatibility, get Darksiders and Assassin's Creed Revelations. 
Here's the list in full as well as the dates of availability: Ryse: Son of Rome: Available April 1-30 on Xbox One The Walking Dead: Season 2: Available April 16-May 15 on Xbox One Darksiders: Available April 1-15 on Xbox 360 and Xbox One Assassin's Creed Revelations: Available April 16-30 on Xbox 360 and Xbox One
